abstract: Adds a single-precision complex matrix to the product of two single-precision complex matrices.

declaration.code: extern void vDSP_zmma(const DSPSplitComplex * __A, vDSP_Stride __IA, const DSPSplitComplex * __B, vDSP_Stride __IB, const DSPSplitComplex * __C, vDSP_Stride __IC, const DSPSplitComplex * __D, vDSP_Stride __ID, vDSP_Length __M, vDSP_Length __N, vDSP_Length __P);

overview:
## Discussion

The following code adds the matrix `c` to the product of matrices `a` and `b`, and writes the result to matrix `d`:

items.description: Adds a double-precision complex matrix to the product of two double-precision complex matrices.
items.name: vDSP_zmmaD

title: vDSP_zmma
